title: MSI Creator 15 review: A gaming laptop turned into a creator PC
content:
The thing that really stands out about the MSI Creator 15 is its beautiful OLED display. Indeed, when you use it, you’re going to fall in love with it, especially if you’ve never used an OLED display on a laptop before. It’s incredible, and if you’re editing photos or videos, that kind of color makes

The post MSI Creator 15 review: A gaming laptop turned into a creator PC appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The MSI Creator 15 comes with a 45W Intel processor and NVIDIA GeForce RTX graphics, but the big selling point is its OLED display.
